text.*:
Somaliland telephone numbers
Location of Somaliland (green) and Location of Somalia (grey)
Location
Country Somaliland
Continent Africa
Access codes
Country calling code +252
International call prefix 008, 009, 010
Trunk prefix 0

Somaliland is a self-declared state, which is internationally recognised as an autonomous region of Somalia.[1][2] Telephone numbers in Somaliland use Somalia's country code +252.[3]

See also[edit]

  • Telephone numbers in Somalia
  • Telecommunications in Somalia
  • Telecommunications in Somaliland

References[edit]

  1. ^ "Issue 270". Retrieved 28 March 2016. 
  2. ^ "The Transitional Federal Charter of the Somali Republic" (PDF). University of Pretoria. 1 February 2004. Archived from the original (PDF) on 25 March 2009. Retrieved 2 February 2010. 
  3. ^ "Somaliland diplomat: It's time to establish our own country calling code - The National". The National (Somaliland). 3 July 2017. Retrieved 9 December 2017.
